Actions.Name: Void Bolt
Actions.Effects: Summon a height 1 debris object in the area.

Actions.Name: Fatal Thaum
Actions.Mark: At the end of that character's turn, shoot a bolt of energy at that character, creating a blast 1 area effect centered on them. Deals [D] to that character, destroys or un-summons all created objects in the area and shoves all other characters 1 away from that character. Then, end this mark.

Actions.Name: Destabilize
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 becomes vulnerable. If that foe moves more than 1 space on its next turn, it also takes [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Annihilate Flesh
Actions.Description: The Pale man chooses the target of its gaze, then focuses its eyes on them. At the end of that character's turn, they take [D] five times. Reduce the number of times this deals damage by [D] for each other character or piece of created terrain in the area, to a minimum of [D].
